description: Demonstrate your military pride with this great flag! This handsome flag is made of good quality polyester and measures 3' X 5'. It is finished with a sturdy canvas header for added durability and features two brass grommets for easy display.  AmericanFlags.com is proud to support our U.S. military, both active duty and retired.

This Heavy Duty A-36 Carbon Steel flagpole stands 100" in height. It has butt diameter of 14," a top diameter of 6.625," and a wall thickness of .500." It is engineered to withstand windspeeds of up to 130 MPH unflagged. It ships in three sections, joined with seamless steel concentric reducers, which provide a uniform tapered appearance.

Standard Features include:


  • Gold Anodized Aluminum Ball
  • Stainless steel aircraft cable halyard
  • Chrome plated bronze swivel snaphooks
  • Neoprene snaphook covers
  • Beaded sling assembly
  • Plastic covered counterweights
  • Stainless steel winch assembly, with removable hand crank
  • Flush access door with cylinder lock and piano hinge
  • Spun aluminum flash collar to match pole
  • Galvanized corrugated steel ground sleeve with grounding spike
  • Urethane gloss enamel finish, designed for maximum gloss and color retention.

    Great for any commercial application and very popular among retailers, including car dealers! We recommend a 30' X 50' Tough Tex Flag for this 100' steel flagpole.

    THESE POLES ARE SHIPPED BY VIA TRUCK FROM LOCATIONS ACROSS THE UNITED STATES. THE SHIPPING COSTS SHOWN AT CHECKOUT REFLECTS A GENERAL ESTIMATE OF SHIPPING COSTS. WE WILL CONTACT YOU AFTER YOU PLACE YOUR ORDER IF THE ACTUAL SHIPPING COSTS TO YOUR LOCATION ARE MORE OR LESS THAN YOU WERE INITIALLY CHARGED. YOU MAY CANCEL YOUR ORDER WITHOUT CHARGE AT THAT POINT IF THE COSTS ARE NOT ACCEPTABLE TO YOU. Shipping weight: 5,393 LBS

This standard is displayed by immediate family members of those serving in the Armed Forces during wartime. The enlisted family member need not be serving overseas in order for his or her family to display the banner. Organizations and businesses may also display the Service Banner if they have members serving in the Armed Forces. Each star typically represents a loved one serving and our service banners can accommodate 1-4 stars. Banner is fully sewn in Nylon, with a crossbar, gold cord and tassel.

* Carefully crafted in high-quality nylon.

* Made in the USA.

* Meets all government standards. 

* Available for immediate shipping.

* Save money by buying direct from AmericanFlags.com

This 10' X 15' Texas State Flag with sewn stripes and star is our top-of-the line, exceptionally durable all-weather flag. Made from heavyweight spun polyester, it is ideal for commercial or institutional use, high wind areas or daily use. It comes with a one year ColorFast Guarantee and matches our Tough Tex US Flags.

AmericanFlags.com is proud to offer these 10' X 15' All-American US flags, which are carefully treated to resist fading, tearing and the shredding you see in foreign-made American flags. Our own testing reveals that these flags outlast other nylon flags by as much as 33%!
  • Premium 200-denier nylon sourced in the USA, not from China.
  • Inks stay bright, bold and keep your flag looking sharp.
  • Nylon fabric is specially treated to resist UV radiation.
  • Four rows of lock stitching on flag ends to resist wind shredding.
  • Double rowed stitching on top and bottom flag hems.
  • Heavy duty roped heading with rust-proof hooks.
  • Industrial strength canvas header is virtually indestructible.
  • Appliqu
  • d stars, sewn stripes with color matched stitching.
  • Lightweight - flies proudly in the lightest breeze and dries quickly.
  • These flags and all their components are Made in America!
AmericanFlags.com sells more US flags than virtually any other online retailer. As such, we buy in bulk and can ship them to you faster and at lower cost. We guarantee that every flag will stay colorfast for one full year from the date of purchase or we will replace it at NO CHARGE. Buy genuine American-Made flags from AmericanFlags.com, your trusted name in flags.

Perma-Nyl Colorfast American Flag Made by Valley Forge
Flags exposed to harsh sunlight, wet weather and wide temperature changes require a strong construction material!
  • These flags are Made in America with sturdy 200 denier nylon fabric.
  • Best resistance to damaging ultraviolet (UV) radiation.
  • Longest lasting, fade-resistant and tear-resistant material available.
  • Flies in the lightest breeze.
  • Provides the brightest colors for a great look.
  • 1-Year manufacturer's ColorFast guarantee.
What is a Perma-Nyl American flag?
  • Perma-Nyl American flags are made by Valley Forge Flag Company, Inc., one of the world's oldest and largest flag manufacturers.
  • Each Perma-Nyl US flag is made of 100% nylon using the finest fabrics, designed specifically or outdoor use.
  • These flags exhibit tremendous strength retention under UV exposure as well as world-class tensile and tear strength.
  • Nylon provides 25% more toughness than polyester with greater abrasion and tear resistance.
Our Perma-Nyl American flags also feature:
  • Strong durable GALVANIZED thimbles.
  • Dense, lock-stitched embroidered stars.
  • Heavy-gauge canvas headers.
  • Double-stitched seams and 4 rows of stitching at fly end.
This great American flag is available for immediate shipping to your door. Other websites and big box stores charge $329.99 for this flag. Buy it direct for less from AmericanFlags.com!

AmericanFlags.com is proud to have a limited supply of these official limited-edition White House Christmas Ornaments.

This White House ornament commemorates the presidency of Grover Cleveland and it is the second of two produced in Cleveland
  • s honor by the White House Historical Association.

    This beautiful ornament illustrates the special place of the Christmas tree in the holiday celebrations of President Cleveland
  • s young family. The central hologram depicts the south fa
  • ade of the White House after an evening snowfall. The warm glow of the first Christmas tree to be illuminated by electric lights is seen through the tall windows of the second floor Oval Room beyond the center of the columned portico. This softly colored view is based on a modern watercolor rendition by artist Margaret Huddy.

    The reverse side of the ornament recreates a scene from the tree-trimming parties of President and Mrs. Cleveland, which were held annually for their children and those of cabinet members. The words of a period newspaper report help to describe the president
  • s delight in preparing Christmas day for his young family. A finely crafted gold plated wreath of snowflakes, painted ice blue frames this beautiful work of art.

    This ornament makes a great gift and comes in a beautiful commemorative gift box that will be treasured forever. Our stock is limited, so place your order today.

The Gonzales Flag, originally designed in 1835, is making a comeback today. The flag traces its origins to a minor skirmish, the Battle of Gonzales, during the Texas revolution. The Mexican government had originally given a small cannon to the colony of Gonzales to protect itself against raids by Comanche Indians six years earlier, and during the revolution was attempting to take back the cannon. The people of Gonzales successfully resisted the Mexican troops and created the handmade Gonzales flag to wave during the battle with the Mexicans, sending a message to <li>Come and Take It.<li> 

This image has become a symbol for champions of the Second Amendment and Gun Rights Advocates.

Our Gonzales Flag comes in two popular sizes - 2'X3' and 3'X5' and is made of durable military grade nylon with brass grommets.

This handsome Come and Take It key fob contains up to 6<li> of super strong, AUTHENTIC, 550 test military spec paracord. This is the same cordage used to rig military parachutes and a 1<li> key ring allows the key fob to sit flat while in a pocket. The Come and Take It emblem is affixed to a stainless military dog tag and it will not rust, fade or scratch. Made in America and made to last!

During the War of 1812, this flag flew aboard Oliver Hazard Perry's flagship "Lawrence" while commanding an American squadron in the Battle of Lake Erie on September 10, 1813. Perry had named his ship after Captain James Lawrence, the hero of an earlier sea battle off New England whose dying words were "Don't Give Up The Ship." These classic 3' X 5' Commodore Perry "Don't Give Up The Ship" flags are made of heavyweight nylon, specially treated to reduce sun and chemical deterioration, and are finished with strong canvas headings and large brass grommets. Exceptional quality and exceptional value, this flag is on sale right now and ready for immediate shipping to your door!

These digitally printed custom golf flags are produced using durable inks and a heavy nylon material in the standard golf flag size of 14"x20". These particular custom golf flags come complete with a study canvas heading and two brass grommets for easy display. Quantity discounts shown apply to flags made in the same size with the same design. Our Embroidered Army Pullover Hoodies are made with a heavyweight poly material and fleeced lined. They feature a drawstring hood, elastic knit cuffs, front pouch pocket, with an embroidered Army logo across the chest and on the left sleeve of the sweatshirt.

These 12’ x 26” nylon feather flags feature the brightest colors available and are fully sewn for durability, rather than dyed like their low-end counterparts. Each flag is finished with a heavy duty pole sleeve designed to accept header up to a 1 1/4" outside diameter pole. A leather tab is sewn into the inside bottom portion of the header allowing a nylon flag tie (included) to secure the flag on to the pole.

Optional pole offered on this page is a 15' Telescoping Superflex Pole. These fiberglass flagpoles sway in the breeze producing a dramatic, attention-getting display. This 15' white pole is adjustable from 6' to 15' and comes complete with a 24" PVC ground sleeve and easy-to-follow instructions.

  • Longer lasting than other feather flags - better quality.
  • Hassle-free ordering, great service and fast shipping.

These top-quality nyl-glo flags feature marine-grade nylon spceially engineered to resist the elements. Each flag features embroidered stars, sewn stripes and two heavy duty brass grommets for easy display. These flags are on sale now, in stock and ready to ship!

These 3' X 5' Nylon EMS flags are constructed of heavy nylon and finished with a canvas header and two brass grommets. These are high-quality flags designed to look great for an extended period of time, especially in adverse conditions.

Erin Go Bragh is the Anglicization of a Gaelic phrase used to express allegiance to Ireland. It is most often translated as "Ireland Forever" Celebrate St. Patrick's Day with this festive Erin Go Bragh flag. The super-poly Irish flag measures 3 feet by 5 feet and features brass grommets for easy display. Our Erin Go Bragh flags are printed with brightest, durable inks on high quality fabrics that are sure make you proud.

This deluxe fire department cap features comfortable 100% brushed cotton twill, raised 3-D embroidered insignia on front panel and brim, sandwich bill & back strap insignia. Adjustable hook & loop closure.

A symbol of courage, commitment and life-saving dedication, the fire department flag is among our most popular. This top quality 3' X 5' all-weather nylon flag features the Maltese Cross and is finished with a reinforced canvas heading and heavy brass grommets. Guaranteed to look great and last!

Our fiberglass poles are designed to withstand winds up to 130 MPH (unflagged) and come with a precision rotating truck to ensure 360-degree tangle-free flying in all wind conditions. They are maintenance free, safe and strong. Their gel-coat surface won't soil, scratch, chalk, crackle or mildew over time. Installation is simple with all necessary accessories included. All of our fiberglass flagpoles come with an anodized gold ball top, base cover, and ground sleeve. Flagpoles 20' and 25' come in one section, while all others come in two sections to reduce shipping costs and ease installation. * Our 20' poles have a butt diameter of 5 3/4 inches, a top diameter of 3 inches, a ball diameter of 5 inches, and a ground sleeve that is 3 feet long.

* Our 25' poles have a butt diameter of 6 inches, a top diameter of 3 inches, a ball diameter of 5 inches and a ground sleeve that is 3 feet long.

* Our 30' poles have a butt diameter of 6 3/4 inches a top diameter of 3 inches, a ball diameter of 6 inches and a ground sleeve that is 3 feet long.

* Our 35' poles have a butt diameter of 7 inches, a top diameter of 3 inches, a ball diameter of 6 inches and a ground sleeve that is 4 feet long.

* Our 40' poles have a butt diameter of 7 inches, a top diameter of 3 inches a ball diameter of 8 inches and a ground sleeve that is 4 feet long.

THESE POLES ARE SHIPPED BY VIA TRUCK FROM LOCATIONS ACROSS THE UNITED STATES. THE SHIPPING COSTS SHOWN AT CHECKOUT REFLECTS A GENERAL ESTIMATE OF SHIPPING COSTS. WE WILL CONTACT YOU AFTER YOU PLACE YOUR ORDER IF THE ACTUAL SHIPPING COSTS TO YOUR LOCATION ARE MORE OR LESS THAN YOU PAID. YOU MAY CANCEL YOUR ORDER WITHOUT CHARGE AT THAT POINT IF THE COSTS ARE NOT ACCEPTABLE TO YOU.

It began as a father's mission and quest for his fallen son, Sergeant Justin "Hobie" Garvey, who died protecting the freedoms of this fine nation. The vision has grown to a thundering cause, and AmericanFlags.com is proud to be a part of this journey. The manufacturer will be donating 30% of the proceeds from the sale of this flag to the "Lest they be Forgotten" foundation - a charity set-up to establish memorials in towns throughout the United States for those soldiers and patriots who have given their lives in the pursuit of liberty during Operations Enduring Freedom and Iraqi Freedom.

This Flag for the Fallen measures 3' X 5' and is proudly made in America with high grade nylon, a canvas header and brass grommets.

The white background of this flag symbolizes the purity our soldiers' hearts and spirits. The black field cross memorial symbolizes the solemness of their dedication and devotion. The red lettering represents their valor and the blood they shed. The gold star is for their Gold Star Families. The gold border embodies the enduring love and memories that only family and friends can share. And those memories? They're more precious than gold.

These high-grade nylon Jolly Roger flags come in a variety of sizes and are suitable for display anywhere. They are specially engineered to withstand the elements and feature reinforced duck headings and solid brass grommets.

These Thin Blue Line US Flags are proudly MADE IN AMERICA and come in two popular sizes. Each flag features the following:
  • High-grade nylon construction for a great look and added durability.
  • Two heavy gauge brass grommets for easy display.
  • Bold stars and stripes sprinted to exact specifications.
  • Reinforced stitching on fly end to resist wind and fraying.
  • Sewn with American-made materials and with American Pride.
The Thin Blue Line is a symbol used by law enforcement, originating in the United Kingdom but now prevalent in the United States and Canada. The flag was designed to commemorate fallen law enforcement officers and to symbolize the relationship of law enforcement in the community, as the protectors of fellow citizens from criminal elements. The Thin Blue Line Flag has become popular among law enforcement personnel, their families and supporters.

The Heirloom Personal Effects Chest was originally commissioned to honor the memory of those soldiers who have fallen while serving to protect this nation. Store your memorabilia, personal possessions and/or flag case in this Heirloom Walnut Chest built to the finest traditions of the military. Available in two popular sizes, the Honor & Remember flag was developed by the Honor and Remember organization to create, establish and promote a nationally recognized flag that would fly continuously as a visible reminder to all Americans of the lives lost in defense of our national freedoms.

The goal of this organization is to promote broad national awareness of the flag, so that military, government and educational facilities as well as households throughout the country would begin flying the Honor and Remember Flag to promote recognition of our nation's fallen warriors.

Annin & Co. gives back a portion of the proceeds from the sale of these flags to the Honor and Remember organization. They, in turn, use these funds to support the effort of donating an Honor and Remember Flag to those families who have lost a loved one in military service to America.

This flag is among the most beautiful you've ever seen and is printed in sharp, vivid colors and top-quality nylon. This Honor & Remember Flag includes two solid brass grommets for easy display.

This is a great flag to fly on Memorial Day, Veteran's Day and the anniversary of September 11th. Also makes a great flag for everyday display and as a gift.

The famous <li>Join or Die<li> snake, believed to have been created by Benjamin Franklin, has long enjoyed the distinction of being the first political cartoon published in an American newspaper. Broken or worn halyard on your flagpole? Get a new one at AmericanFlags.com! Of course, it is best to replace your halyard before it breaks so that you can use the old one to pull the new one to the top of your flagpole. These wire core halyards are the finest quality and most durable on the market today. We carry braided nylon halyards in a variety of sizes and halyards with a wire core for added strength and durability. Price listed is per foot.

How much halyard do I need?
You'll want to get a length of halyard about twice the above-ground height of your flagpole. If your cleat is mounted at eye level, that will give you enough extra for making knots and wrapping the halyard around the cleat.

The 2016 White House Christmas ornament salutes Herbert Hoover, our nation's thirty-first president. President Hoover served from 1929 to 1933, a tough time for our country as we suffered the Great Depression.

This year's ornament measures 3 1/2" x 1 1/2" x 3/4" and was designed by art student Kayla Whelan, who attends Montserrat College of Art in Beverly, Massachusetts. 

This special keepsake is inspired by the fire engines that responded to the historic four alarm fire that broke out at the White House on Christmas Eve, 1929. The fire, smoke and water damage was significant, but the repairs were completed and the Hoovers moved back into the White House in April of the following year. That Christmas, they distributed toy fire trucks to children who visited the White House. 

The ornament is crafted from shiny brass plated with nickel and 24-karat gold, and the fire engine carries a Christmas tree for delivery to the White House.

Comes in a handsome gift box, is in stock and ready to ship. Quantities are extremely limited, so be sure to get yours today!

Our nylon flags are the best money can buy. These SolarMax flags are made of an extraordinarily durable nylon that stands up to high winds, bright sunlight and UV rays. These flags feature a dense 200 denier nylon weave and premium quality stitching. They are also backed by our unconditional one-year colorfast replacement guarantee. Available in all sizes! These are double-sided flags in which the image shows correctly on both sides of the flag, versus single reverse flags on which the image shows correctly from just one side. This is the flag you want for flagpoles, where viewers are likely to see the flag from both sides.

Our nylon POW/MIA flags are the best money can buy. These SolarMax POW flags are made of an extraordinarily durable nylon that stands up to high winds, bright sunlight and UV rays. These flags feature a dense 200 denier nylon weave and premium quality stitching. They are also backed by our one-year colorfast replacement guarantee. Available in all sizes! These are single reverse flags, which means that the same image displays on both sides of the flag, versus our double-sided POW-MIA flags on which the image shows correctly on both sides of the flag. While the double-sided flag is considerably heavier than the single reverse flag, it doesn't fly as easily as the lighter alternative.

The Star-Spangled Banner flag flew over Fort McHenry during the Battle of Baltimore as part of the War of 1812. The flag waving in its majestic beauty during the battle inspired Francis Scott Key to write the poem "The Star-Spangled Banner", which would later become our cherished national anthem. Our Star Spangled Banner flags come in heavy duty nylon and cotton and are among the best money can buy.

A common symbol for the transgender community is the transgender pride flag, which was designed by Monica Helms, and was first shown at a pride parade in Phoenix, Arizona, United States in 2000. This great flag measures 3' X 5' and is constructed of lightweight polyester. Great for indoor or outdoor use and comes with two metal grommets on the end for easy display.

The trans pride flag consists of five horizontal stripes, two light blue, two pink, with a white stripe in the center.

The light blue is the traditional color for baby boys, pink is for girls, and the white in the middle is for those who are transitioning, those who feel they have a neutral gender or no gender, and those who are intersexed. The pattern is such that no matter which way you fly it, it will always be correct.
